QuestData.Title: Pick a Yak
QuestData.Description: I can't find a single good yak here. ALL the yaks are bad!$b$bSome are too stinky, some too fight-y, others just scared.$b$bYou look like a lucky $r. Here, take a lasso. See if you can find a good yak for me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Yak Lasso on Wild Townlong Yaks, then fight against them to see if they are suitable for Bluesaddle.
QuestData.CompletionText: See? I told you! No good yaks.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, well! A good yak!$b$bTell you what, $n. I take this GOOD yak, and you can do whatever you want with this bad, bad one.
